title: The Walking Dead: Samantha Morton on playing ‘incredible badass survivor’ Alpha
text:
The Whisperers are led by Alpha (Picture: AMC)

The Walking Dead’s latest unkillable villain is the genuinely terrifying Alpha, the leader of a cult of skin mask-wearing killers known as The Whisperers.

This current crop of villains are set to be a looming presence throughout season 10, with last night’s episode entirely focused on their creepy group.

Alpha is being played to chilling perfection by British actress Samantha Morton, and in a new interview she’s explained more about the continuing development of her character.

Describing Alpha as ‘an incredible badass survivor’, Morton told The Hollywood Reporter that she pushed for her character to be shown as ‘very practical’, especially during the early days of the zombie apocalypse.

‘She’s been so practical in protecting her daughter and surviving that she doesn’t have much stuff with her. She’s just an incredible badass survivor.

‘While her decisions may look awful to someone else, she is not going to at any point do anything that would get in the way of protecting her daughter.’

Morton also revealed that she prepared for the intense role by watching documentaries on cults – and you can count The Whisperers’ anti-civilisation outlook fitting right into the category.

Apocalyptic Alpha (Picture: AMC)

‘Technology was messing everything up, so Alpha wants to live in the woods and take ayahuasca and be feral, in a way,’ Morton reasoned. ‘That’s nature.

‘It’s better than the way human beings have been living, whether it’s globalisation or capitalism. She’s like a f***ed-up eco warrior.

‘She thinks that at the end of the day, everyone has wars. She just wants to live — weirdly, peacefully, as a Whisperer. You have to remember that: she didn’t start this trouble. She’s just… finishing it.’

Morton also hinted that Alpha isn’t going anywhere soon, revealing that she’d still been shooting for season 10 over the past week.

‘I’m still shooting. I had a tough day yesterday, I have to tell you. It was a tough day in a good way. I’m still in it. I’m still shooting it.

‘You have to be the best you’ve ever been every day, because you can’t not be,’ she added of the pressures of playing a Walking Dead villain.

The Walking Dead season 10 continues Sunday in the US, with episodes releasing Mondays on Fox in the UK.
